sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.synopsis: <!ELEMENT package (packageinfo?, stage+)> <!ATTLIST package name CDATA #REQUIRED version CDATA #REQUIRED>
sect2.para: This element occurs in the elements : |

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element package is one of the many main operation elements. It describes the build process of a package.
The actual build process is described by the stage sub-elements.
The attribute name contains the name of the package.
The attribute version contains the version of the package.
